query:
-- Enable the 5 originally seeded sources
UPDATE evidence_sources SET isWhitelisted = true WHERE name IN ('World Bank', 'International Monetary Fund', 'Humanitarian Data Exchange', 'ACLED', 'FEWS NET');

-- Insert 15 comprehensive Yemen sources
INSERT INTO evidence_sources (name, nameAr, acronym, category, baseUrl, apiEndpoint, apiType, isWhitelisted, description) VALUES
('Central Bank of Yemen', 'البنك المركزي اليمني', 'CBY', 'government', 'https://english.cby-ye.com', NULL, 'none', true, 'Yemen central bank providing monetary aggregates, financial statistics, and economic indicators'),
('HDX HAPI', 'منصة تبادل البيانات الإنسانية', 'HDX', 'international', 'https://hapi.humdata.org', 'https://hapi.humdata.org/api/v2/', 'rest', true, 'UN OCHA humanitarian data API providing standardized indicators for Yemen'),
('World Food Programme Yemen', 'برنامج الأغذية العالمي', 'WFP', 'international', 'https://www.wfp.org', 'https://hapi.humdata.org/api/v2', 'rest', true, 'UN agency providing food security indicators and food prices for Yemen'),
('FAO', 'منظمة الأغذية والزراعة', 'FAO', 'international', 'https://www.fao.org', 'https://nsi-release-ro-statsuite.fao.org/rest/data/', 'rest', true, 'UN agency providing food security, nutrition, and agricultural data for Yemen'),
('IOM DTM', 'المنظمة الدولية للهجرة', 'IOM', 'international', 'https://dtm.iom.int', 'https://dtm.iom.int/api/v3', 'rest', true, 'UN migration agency providing displacement tracking data for Yemen'),
('UNICEF Yemen', 'اليونيسف اليمن', 'UNICEF', 'international', 'https://www.unicef.org/yemen', 'https://sdmx.data.unicef.org/ws/public/sdmxapi/rest/', 'rest', true, 'UN children agency providing child-related indicators for Yemen'),
('UNDP Yemen', 'برنامج الأمم المتحدة الإنمائي', 'UNDP', 'international', 'https://www.undp.org/yemen', 'https://api.open.undp.org', 'rest', true, 'UN development agency providing project data and development indicators for Yemen'),
('Yemen Data Project', 'مشروع بيانات اليمن', 'YDP', 'research', 'https://yemendataproject.org', NULL, 'none', true, 'Independent project tracking airstrikes and civilian casualties in Yemen'),
('Sana\'a Center', 'مركز صنعاء للدراسات', 'SCSS', 'research', 'https://sanaacenter.org', NULL, 'none', true, 'Yemen-focused think tank providing political, economic, and security analysis'),
('Yemen Polling Center', 'مركز اليمن للاستطلاع', 'YPC', 'research', 'https://yemenpolling.org', NULL, 'none', true, 'Yemen-based polling organization providing public opinion data'),
('CSO Yemen', 'الجهاز المركزي للإحصاء', 'CSO', 'government', 'https://www.cso-ye.org', NULL, 'none', true, 'Yemen national statistical office providing official statistics'),
('MoPIC', 'وزارة التخطيط والتعاون الدولي', 'MoPIC', 'government', 'https://www.mopic.gov.ye', NULL, 'none', true, 'Yemen ministry responsible for development planning and aid coordination'),
('ReliefWeb', 'ريليف ويب', 'RW', 'international', 'https://reliefweb.int', 'https://api.reliefweb.int/v2/', 'rest', true, 'UN OCHA humanitarian information service providing reports and news for Yemen'),
('Food Security Cluster', 'المجموعة العالمية للأمن الغذائي', 'FSC', 'international', 'https://www.foodsecuritycluster.net', 'https://hapi.humdata.org/api/v1', 'rest', true, 'Coordination mechanism providing food security data for Yemen'),
('World Bank Yemen', 'البنك الدولي اليمن', 'WB', 'international', 'https://www.worldbank.org/en/country/yemen', 'https://api.worldbank.org/v2/', 'rest', true, 'World Bank comprehensive economic and social indicators for Yemen')
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE isWhitelisted = true;
command:

ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE isWhitelisted = true;
